CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to forward messages

USERS.description: Sudo Users ID seperated by space.

LINK_CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to save links messages

ZIP_CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to save zip files

FILES_CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to save files

NAMES_CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to save names zip files

NAMES_TEXT_CHAT.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat where to save names messages

ENVIRONMENT.description: Set True/False if you want to use environment variables
